quotes.text: Machine learning is the last invention that humanity will ever need to make.
quotes.author: Nick Bostrom

quotes.text: AI is probably the most important thing humanity has ever worked on.
quotes.author: Sundar Pichai

quotes.text: The key to artificial intelligence has always been the representation.
quotes.author: Jeff Hawkins

quotes.text: Success in creating AI would be the biggest event in human history.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: It's not magic; it's math. And the math is beautiful.
quotes.author: 3Blue1Brown

quotes.text: In God we trust. All others must bring data.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.text: The goal of machine learning is to make machines learn from experience.
quotes.author: Tom Mitchell

quotes.text: An approximate answer to the right problem is worth a good deal more than an exact answer to an approximate problem.
quotes.author: John Tukey

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.text: Gradient descent can find the minimum of any differentiable function. That's the whole trick.
quotes.author: Andrej Karpathy

quotes.text: Torture the data, and it will confess to anything.
quotes.author: Ronald Coase

quotes.text: All models are wrong, but some are useful.
quotes.author: George Box

quotes.text: If you want to master something, teach it.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman
